name: Space-Net: Cosmo Red
overview: In the year August 2000, the ISNA or International Space-Net Agency received an SOS signal from the Rainbow System, a star system of seven planets named after colours, and have already sent out several agents to help. It is apparent that the Rainbow System is being attacked by a mysterious legion calling themselves the "Crackers". To rescue the Rainbow System, it was decided to urgently recruit agents. The player assumes the role a new agent. Their support is the commander assistant Agent Angie.
